results.title: Simvastatin ameliorates graft-vs-host disease by regulating angiopoietin-1 and angiopoietin-2 in a murine model.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ ameliorates @<m>DISEASE_Graft_vs_Host_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006086 @@@graft-vs-host disease@@@ by regulating @GENE_ANGPT1 @GENE_11600 @@@angiopoietin-1@@@ and @GENE_ANGPT2 @GENE_11601 @@@angiopoietin-2@@@ in a @SPECIES_10090 @@@murine@@@ model.
